name: ModifyEnvFolder
description:
Partially update a specific environment folder.

Use this tool to partially update a specific persisted folder within an environment by providing the project and folder IDs.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Provide the Project ID to access the specific environment. Retrieve it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: persisted_folder_id
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the persisted folder to be updated.

parameters.name: environment_folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the environment folder to update. Provide a valid string ID.

parameters.name: folder_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the folder: `home` for Home or `pinned` for Pinned.

parameters.name: environment_folder_protocol
parameters.description: Specify the protocol type for the environment folder, such as 'home' or 'pinned'.

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.description: Specify the updated path for the environment folder.

parameters.name: environment_folder_creation_date
parameters.description: The creation date of the environment folder. Expected in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: environment_folder_last_updated
parameters.description: The timestamp when the environment folder was last updated. Use ISO 8601 format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this Persisted Folder.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
